China undergoes rare scrutiny of rights record at UN meetingChina underwent scrutiny of its human rights record at a key U.N. meeting on Tuesday, with Western countries calling for more protections for Xinjiang Uyghurs and greater freedom in Hong Kong while Beijing said it had made historic progress. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 10:06:50 GMT X5M3ISYEVVMVXALGBBFKJOILVA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-undergoes-rare-scrutiny-rights-record-un-meeting-2024-01-23/Emma Farge世界中国
Turkey set to approve Sweden's NATO membership bid after long delayTurkey's parliament is widely expected to approve Sweden's NATO membership bid on Tuesday, clearing the biggest remaining hurdle to expanding the Western military alliance. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 09:55:46 GMT第2756章https://www.reuters.com/world/turkey-set-approve-swedens-nato-membership-bid-after-long-delay-2024-01-23/Huseyin Hayatsever, Tuvan Gumrukcu世界
Germany can cut funding to far-right party, rules courtGermany can cut off state funding to the successor party to the far-right NPD even though it is not banned, the Constitutional Court said on Tuesday in a landmark ruling which adds fuel to a debate about whether the nationalist AfD could be penalised. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 09:30:31 GMT FUUK4SLF5ZIUXDBNXBUYD76J7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-can-cut-funding-far-right-party-rules-court-2024-01-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Hindus throng Ram temple in India's Ayodhya as it opens to the publicTens of thousands of Hindus braved biting cold on Tuesday to pray at a new temple to Lord Ram in India's northern city of Ayodhya, a day after its inaugural by Prime Minister Narendra Modi at a site believed to be the god-king's birthplace. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 09:11:19 GMT S3IM6DC3NBIWJCBAESDW6DJYGM https://www.reuters.com/world/india/hindus-throng-ram-temple-indias-ayodhya-it-opens-public-2024-01-23/Sunil Kataria, Saurabh Sharma世界印度
NATO signs 1.1 billion euro contract for 155mm artillery ammunitionNATO signed a 1.1 billion euro ($1.2 billion) contract for hundreds of thousands of 155mm artillery rounds on Tuesday, some of which will be supplied to Ukraine after Kyiv complained of ammunition shortages. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 08:56:41 GMT HLEJZDPRCRICNAUWWA5WAF4NBE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/nato-signs-11-bln-euro-contract-155mm-artillery-ammunition-2024-01-23/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Myanmar military plane overshoots runway in India, eight injuredAt least eight people were injured after a Myanmar military aircraft that was supposed to fly back dozens of soldiers fleeing conflict at home overshot the runway of an airport in northeastern India on Tuesday, officials said. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 08:37:20 GMT NTQ74ZTFNZIRDHWNIFFI2VFUMI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-military-plane-overshoots-runway-india-eight-injured-2024-01-23/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
Jailed Kremlin critic Navalny put in solitary confinement in Arctic prison - spokespersonJailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny has been placed in solitary confinement for 10 days in a prison above the Arctic circle for "incorrectly introducing himself" to a guard, his spokesperson said late on Monday. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 08:20:32 GMT XG32ESV4YZI2PPOQSY4LP635FY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/jailed-kremlin-critic-navalny-put-solitary-confinement-arctic-prison-2024-01-23/Reuters世界欧洲
China hopes UN review of human rights is constructive, non-politicisedThe Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday that it hoped all parties at the United Nations reviewing China's human rights record would be "constructive" and "non-politicised". Tue, 23 Jan 2024 07:58:28 GMT W2L44UIWTVMRVMVEGZTKB6PSGI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-hopes-un-review- human-rights-constructive-non-politicized-2024-01-23/Reuters世界中国
Farmer protests spread across rural France; one dead in roadblock accidentFrench farmers in tractors and trucks expanded their roadblocks on Tuesday, resulting in numerous traffic jams as well as one fatal accident, as unions urged the government to address their demands for lower costs and regulation. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 07:47:49 GMT SG5EQZJRHVL5FCUTQUEEPVT5XQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/woman-dies-after-car-hits-french-farmers-roadblock-police-2024-01-23/Sudip Kar-Gupta世界欧洲
Drones are hit and miss for Ukrainian soldiersA Ukrainian soldier near the front line looks into video goggles and clutches a control set in both hands as he guides a drone during the war against Russia. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 07:33:23 GMT WMLQQ5NJ35KIZH2PGC2NEMRWJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/drones-are-hit-miss-ukrainian-soldiers-2024-01-23/Inna Varenytsia世界欧洲
Three killed in helicopter skiing crash in British ColumbiaAt least three people were killed on Monday in the crash of a helicopter carrying a group of recreational skiers on an outing in British Columbia, the tour operator said in a statement. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:30:41 GMT MSQGDH2CPVLGPIRZF7SAXDEZJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/third-killed-helicopter-skiing-crash-british-columbia-2024-01-23/Reuters世界美洲
